name: Sword Defense
description:
Sword Defense a 3-D Chinese style action and leisure game.

The main content is to cut off all kinds of weapons constantly flying out on the screen. It requires players to move quickly and accurately, and have endless modes to challenge you.

Players stand on the scene of VR, pick up three swords on the ground, chop knives, guns, sticks and sticks that constantly appear from the scene, score after knocking down, the higher the score, the higher the ranking.

VR is a realistic game, super-strong sense of attack, to bring you a pleasant game experience and visual impact.

Are you a world-class expert? Do you have Chinese Kungfu?

Different games, wait for you to experience.

You! Dare to enter the world of Chinese games?

Legend has it that in ancient times, three mysterious immortals guarded the ancient heaven and resisted the invasion of the army of the devil world. They fought against the enemy outside the South Tianmen with their swords. They did not want to use the three divine swords millions of years later. After the transformation of the God thunder, the souls of the three Immortals entered their own divine swords, making the power of the divine swords stronger. They could continue to guard the South Tianmen from the devil world. Invasion. Although the soul of the immortals has entered the divine sword, they have replaced the sword spirit of the divine sword. They have become the existence of the sword spirit of the divine sword themselves. Millions of years of hardening have made their memories disappear along with the course of eternity. Only remember the thought of not letting the devil enter the South Tianmen step by step, as if waiting for their next master's arrival? Reluctantly waiting, waiting for thousands of years to tens of millions of years of time is still waiting for people to guard with them.

The powerful in the demon world have also turned into a variety of magic swords, magic blades, magic arrows to destroy the three divine swords, to occupy the moment of the magic sword!
